about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • Multi-choice, single-ending VN with 2+ hours till credits

STORY

Working as a servant of a mansion, the protagonist one day breaks a precious vase belonging to his money-hungry master—and is fired.
Now in heavy debt, he must make cash as an instructor to pay off what he owes.
But the one he's tasked to look after is none other than an infamously vicious Beastkin known as Urunhilda.

CHARACTERS


Protagonist
A young man formerly hired to work as a servant of a mansion.
After breaking a vase his master, Schene, cherished, he's sold off as an instructor to look after Beastkin despite his lack of experience with ladies.
Brought up in the countryside, he can be rather naïve and even off when it comes to social norms.


Urunhilda
A Beastkin lady owned by one particular wealthy man—and the main heroine.
She's the one the protagonist will be conducting lessons with.
Capable of tearing people to shreds when in a bad mood, no common instructor can deal with her.
Beastkin are incredibly rare species in this world.
Urunhilda is an especially rare Beastkin known as the Golden Beastkin. Apparently, she didn't always have Beastkin ears, and she used to be a young noble lady attending an academy for aristocrats only days ago.


Hazuki
A maid dressed rather peculiarly for someone of her occupation.
She used to work for the protagonist's master as well, but was fired along with him and so she became his maid instead.
She sells him items that assist him with his lessons and helps him train for his duties.


Little Beastkin
A mysterious army of Beastkin. They increase in numbers when certain conditions are met.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional crude humor, crass language. All love interests are 18 years of age or older.

movies.name: Beastkin ☆ Training ~The Trials of a Beastkin Noblewoman~

name: Beastkin ☆ Training ~The Trials of a Beastkin Noblewoman~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You are a former servant, sold off as an instructor to take care of a Beastkin! Flatter the Beastkin by having chats, gifting presents, and more. Whether or not you can take great care of her is up to you.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
